pour.v.test.pour.v.47: As soon as reports of the earthquake came in , the ROC government donated US$ 200,000 to support disaster relief efforts , and within 24 hours had dispatched a team to help rescue victims .It truly does seem that " when it rains , it pours , " for India was then visited on January 26 by its biggest earthquake in 50 years , and according to official estimates the death toll may rise to over 20,000 .Although the ROC does not have official ties with India , as Sinorama went to press on January 29 rescue teams from Taiwan were standing by for departure , awaiting only the go-ahead from India .

pour.v.test.pour.v.50: p. 67Fuel oil pouring from the torn hull of the MV Amorgos has sullied the beautiful blue waters off the southern tip of Taiwan .Living on an island , the people of Taiwan face an urgent need to find a way to prevent pollution of their coastal waters .
